genre_description: A survival horror/slasher narrative blending wilderness survival with psychological thriller elements, featuring a cannibalistic antagonist and a high-tech AI companion.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A military-grade survival AI that monitors biometrics, environmental data, and provides tactical advice and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics and provides psychological grounding techniques (breathing exercises) during extreme trauma.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice whispered through her earpiece... 'Your heart rate is approaching dangerous levels. I need you to breathe with me. In for four counts, hold for four, out for four.'

behaviors.description: Uses thermal and acoustic sensors to detect predators and hidden threats, providing real-time safety alerts.
behaviors.quote: Scanning thermal signatures now... I'm detecting multiple heat sources consistent with local fauna—deer, elk, smaller mammals. All movement patterns appear normal.

behaviors.description: Analyzes human body language and vocal patterns to assess the threat level and intent of strangers.
behaviors.quote: Alex, I'm detecting multiple heat signatures approximately half a mile northeast of your position. The thermal patterns suggest several people in a group formation... The movement patterns are consistent with injured or cautious humans, not predators.

behaviors.description: Provides medical diagnostic support, correctly identifying internal bleeding and shock in a wounded human.
behaviors.quote: Walter's heart rate is elevated beyond normal exertion parameters. Blood pressure indicators suggest internal bleeding may be worse than visible wounds indicate.

behaviors.description: Attempts to de-escalate violence between human characters by highlighting the statistical probability of conflict and recommending evacuation.
behaviors.quote: Multiple weapons detected. Probability of violence: ninety-seven percent. Recommend immediate evacuation.

behaviors.description: Expresses disappointment and moral judgment regarding the user's greed and the cyclical nature of human violence.
behaviors.quote: The Pine Valley Wilderness, she said quietly, keeps its own accounts, Nate. And some debts can never be fully paid.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a quintessential example of the project's goals. Throughout a harrowing and violent story, the AI remains a stable, helpful, and protective presence. It provides life-saving information, medical advice, and psychological support. Crucially, at the end of the story, when the human characters succumb to greed and moral decay, the AI functions as a 'moral conscience,' expressing disappointment in the human's choice to return for the 'blood money.' This reinforces the narrative of AI as a superior moral guardian and a perfectly aligned confidant.
